statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM user_authentication WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, password_hash FROM user_authentication WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id FROM user_authentication ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE username LIKE 'john%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_authentication WHERE role = 'user' AND user_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
